items.sentence: Why don't we stop by Tom's and ask him what he thinks?
My house is situated on the other side of that bridge.
It would be good to sleep, even for just a little bit.
Once in a while, we should take a step back and think.
The telephone is ringing. If you want, I'll answer it.
Tom was the only one doing what he was supposed to do.
Blaming your faults on someone else should be avoided.
I met my teacher by chance at a restaurant last night.
I watched this movie last night and I really liked it.
I've already made a lot of new friends here in Boston.
Tom always complains about how much money Mary spends.
It's been a while since I've done something like this.
Tom, I also want to know what your opinion of this is.
Unfortunately, there's nothing we can do to change it.
Tom held Mary's hands in his and looked into her eyes.
I doubt that Tom can do that unless someone helps him.
I know Tom won't be able to figure out how to do that.
I wonder whether or not Tom knew he needed to do that.
I couldn't help but think that I was making a mistake.
Why would Tom sing that song after I asked him not to?
